metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14880 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The OSPFv3 parser in tcpdump before 4.9.3 has a buffer over-read in print-ospf6.c:ospf6_print_lshdr().

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14880` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
